verses.text:
Crown Him, the children,
Hail Him as thy Saviour true;
Ye lambs of Christ, your tribute bring,
Ye children great and small; Ho - san - na ring.
The chil - dren sang what they learned at Jesus' knee.

Ye lambs of Christ, your tribute bring,
Ye children great and small; Ho - san - na ring.
The chil - dren sang what they learned at Jesus' knee.
The chil - dren sang what they learned at Jesus' knee.

chorus.text:
Hail, hail, hail, thou holy, holy, holy Lord!
A time to sing through all the earth;
Christ your King, And crown him Lord of all,
And crown him Lord of all.
